response.original_title: 世にもエロスな物語～愉悦～
response.overview: -1- Yuka (Minase Yuka) dreams to be raped. Her lover helped her when she was raped in the past. One night, the face of the perpetrator in her dream is replaced with her lovers, so she turns to a psychiatrist. The doctor uses hypnotherapy to strip the unconscious Yuka naked on the examination table and begins to rape her violently.  -2- Maiko (Asai Maika) husband left her for another woman. One day, she is imprisoned by an escaped convict. "Your husband seduced my wife so now you are mine" One day her husband returns after her suspicious behavior is reported to the police, the two begin making love in front of him.  -3- Career woman Sakurai (Sakurai Ayu) is dating elite Katayama, but is dissatisfied with his self-indulgent sex. One day, Sakurai is raped by Oki, a regular employee who dislikes her. After that, whenever Oki calls her, she goes to meet him and endures the humiliating sexual acts. The more she is humiliated, the more Sakurai burns with pleasure in being sexually abused.
response.title: The World's Most Erotic Story: Pleasure
